org.jasig.cas.util

Class CompressionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.CompressionUtils

  • public final class CompressionUtils
extends Object
    This is CompressionUtils that encapsulates common base64 calls and operations in one spot.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed mmoayyed@unicon.net

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] decodeBase64ToByteArray(byte[] data)
      Decode the byte[] in base64.
      static byte[] decodeBase64ToByteArray(String data)
      Base64 decode operation, which retrieves the equivalent byte[] of the data in UTF-8 encoding and decodes the result.

      Decode the byte[] in base64 to a string.

      Deflate the given bytes using zlib.

      Deflate the given string via a Deflater.

        Inflate the given byte array by INFLATED_ARRAY_LENGTH.

        Returns:
        the array as a string with UTF-8 encoding

      • deflate

        public static String deflate(byte[] bytes)
        Deflate the given bytes using zlib. The result will be base64 encoded with UTF8_ENCODING.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the bytes
        Returns:
        the converted string

      • deflate

        public static String deflate(String data)
        Deflate the given string via a Deflater. The result will be base64 encoded with UTF8_ENCODING.
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        Returns:
        base64 encoded string

      • encodeBase64

        public static String encodeBase64(byte[] data)
        Base64-encode the given byte[] as a string.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded string

      • decodeBase64ToByteArray

        public static byte[] decodeBase64ToByteArray(String data)
        Base64 decode operation, which retrieves the equivalent byte[] of the data in UTF-8 encoding and decodes the result.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to encode
        Returns:
        the base64 decoded byte[] or null

      • decodeBase64ToByteArray

        public static byte[] decodeBase64ToByteArray(byte[] data)
        Decode the byte[] in base64.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • decodeByteArrayToString

        public static String decodeByteArrayToString(byte[] bytes)
        Decode the byte[] in base64 to a string.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the data to encode
        Returns:
        the new string in UTF8_ENCODING.
